tool.name: OGS: MapGeometryToMeshSurface
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'MapGeometryToMeshSurface'.
tool.command: if [ "$mesh_file" != "None" ] && [ ! -e '${$mesh_file.element_identifier}' ]; then ln -s '$mesh_file' '${$mesh_file.element_identifier}'; fi; if [ "$input_geometry" != "None" ] && [ ! -e '${$input_geometry.element_identifier}' ]; then ln -s '$input_geometry' '${$input_geometry.element_identifier}'; fi; MapGeometryToMeshSurface --mesh-file '$mesh_file.element_identifier' --input-geometry '$input_geometry.element_identifier' $additional_insert_mapping --output-geometry output_1.gml

param.name: mesh_file
param.label: mesh file
param.help: Input (.vtu). the input file containing the mesh

param.name: input_geometry
param.label: input geometry
param.help: Input (.gml). the file containing the input geometry

param.name: additional_insert_mapping
param.label: additional insert mapping
param.help: Advanced mapping algorithm will be applied, i.e. a new geometry will be created and possibly new points will be inserted.

tool.help: This tool runs the **MapGeometryToMeshSurface** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
